analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The reverse order of the law of conditionality, The Paṭṭhāna text with the Tikas

original: 23.39. Sanidassanattika, Kusalattika🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho kusalo dhammo
analyzed: sani dassana ttika kusala ttika  na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na kusalam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ
translated: With-object-of-consciousness, profitable triad🔽With-object-of-consciousness, with impingement, unprofitable, as condition, without-object-of-consciousness, without-impingement, profitable …

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho🔽kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakusalañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na anidassana sappaṭigham na kusalam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ  kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na kusalañca na a nidassana sa paṭigha
translated: Without-object-of-consciousness, without-impingement, unprofitable, as condition, without-object-of-consciousness, without-impingement,

original: nakusalañca dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽(Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalañca dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: profitable … With-object-of-consciousness, with-impingement, unprofitable, and without-object-of-consciousness, without-impingement, unprofitable, as condition, without-object-of-consciousness, without-impingement, profitable …🔽(In brief) … in the case of cause there are three … in the case of absence there are three.

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na akusalam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With-object-of-consciousness, with-impingement, unprofitable, as condition, without-object-of-consciousness, without-impingement, unprofitable … (In brief) … in the case of cause there are three … in the case of absence there are three.

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā satta
translated: With a visible-form object that is a condition, a visible-form object that is neutral arises. With a visible-form object that is a condition, a non-visible-form object that is neutral arises. With a visible-form object that is a condition, a visible-form object that is neutral and a non-visible-form object that is neutral arise. (Abbreviated.)

analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭigha na abyākata mūlāni sattam eva duka mūlāni sattam eva sabbam ekavīsatim eva
translated: (The roots with a non-visible-form object that is a condition and neutral are the same as the seventh. The roots with a visible-form object and a non-visible-form object that are conditions and neutral are the same as the seventh. All are the same as the twenty-first.)

original: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekavīsa adhipatiyā ekavīsa pe avigate ekavīsa
translated: With a cause as condition, twenty-one. With predominance as condition, twenty-one. … With non-disappearance as condition, twenty-one.
